text:
Jarret Webster Johnson (born August 14, 1981) is an American Football outside linebacker for the San Diego Chargers of the National Football League. He played college football at the University of Alabama. Johnson appreciated as an "unsung hero" and defensive leader by Baltimore fans. Johnson has scored two career touchdowns and has been a steady presence on a great Ravens defense.
On March 14, 2012, Johnson signed a 4-year contract with the San Diego Chargers without giving the Ravens a chance to match the offer.
References.
1.^ "[http://bleacherreport.com/articles/1104723-baltimore-ravens-lose-free-agent-defenders-cory-redding-and-jarret-johnson Johnson signs 4-year deal with Chargers]"
